name: Cookie Gardening VR
description:
Has this ever happened to you? You're trying to do some regular gardening, but all your sentient vegetables keep running away. Well, weep no more! With your magic cookie-creating powers, you'll be able to catch those tricky vegetables, grow them, and put them in your basket to sell—just like in real life.

(This game is currently in alpha, and I really appreciate feedback. Please feel free to email me your thoughts at cookie.gardening@gmail.com. You can also reach me, and find more updates, at https://twitter.com/knipsch. Have fun!)
